Sentencas: In response to greenhouse effect and energy crisis, the clean and efficient use of CH4 and CO2 resources has become increasingly attractive.
Titulo: Direct carbon dioxide-methane solid oxide fuel cells combined with in-situ exsolution perovskite La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Fe0.4Cu0.1O3-8-based dry reforming catalysts

Sentencas: Against this background, solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) have become one of the research hotspots due to the possibility of utilizing methane and carbon dioxide for the conversion into syngas (H2 and CO) for efficient direct power generation.
Titulo: Direct carbon dioxide-methane solid oxide fuel cells combined with in-situ exsolution perovskite La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Fe0.4Cu0.1O3-8-based dry reforming catalysts

Sentencas: In this study, we propose to dope Cu into La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Fe0.5O3-8 to enhance the catalytic activity for direct carbon dioxide-methane dry reforming reactions.
Titulo: Direct carbon dioxide-methane solid oxide fuel cells combined with in-situ exsolution perovskite La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Fe0.4Cu0.1O3-8-based dry reforming catalysts

Sentencas: In wet hydrogen conditions, Fe nanoparticles can effectively exsolve from La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Fe0.4Cu0.1O3-8 (LSCFC), which is beneficial for the dry reforming reaction of methane.
Titulo: Direct carbon dioxide-methane solid oxide fuel cells combined with in-situ exsolution perovskite La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Fe0.4Cu0.1O3-8-based dry reforming catalysts

Sentencas: With the LSCFC-Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-8 (LSCFC-GDC) composite reforming layer, the anode-supported single cells exhibited remarkable electrochemical performance.
Titulo: Direct carbon dioxide-methane solid oxide fuel cells combined with in-situ exsolution perovskite La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Fe0.4Cu0.1O3-8-based dry reforming catalysts

Sentencas: When fueled with both H2 and CH4-CO2, the maximum power densities achieved 608.3 and 497.1 mW cm-2 at 800 degrees C, with corresponding polarization resistance values of 0.35 and 1.11 omega cm2, respectively.
Titulo: Direct carbon dioxide-methane solid oxide fuel cells combined with in-situ exsolution perovskite La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Fe0.4Cu0.1O3-8-based dry reforming catalysts

Sentencas: Furthermore, the single cells with LSCFC-GDC reforming layer showed excellent carbon tolerance, maintaining stable performance for 120 h using 50%CH4-50%CO2.
Titulo: Direct carbon dioxide-methane solid oxide fuel cells combined with in-situ exsolution perovskite La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Fe0.4Cu0.1O3-8-based dry reforming catalysts

Sentencas: Our results demonstrate the use of dry reforming catalysts in SOFCs is effective in both enhancing CH4-CO2 reforming efficiency and maintaining carbon tolerance.
Titulo: Direct carbon dioxide-methane solid oxide fuel cells combined with in-situ exsolution perovskite La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Fe0.4Cu0.1O3-8-based dry reforming catalysts
